thread.title: First time visit to NYC
thread.title_full: First time visit to NYC - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DomesticDiva_8
title: First time visit to NYC
text: A girls getaway weekend with friends turned out to be a great location. We were central to everything and able to walk or subway directly from the hotel. Very basic and comfortable. Decor and amenities were up to date and bed was very comfortable. would stay again for a quick visit.
